A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Let me know when the kids at Disney want to make a real movie. Outside of Luke\, that was extra cheesy. I cannot believe how bad that movie was\, no action\, no story\, no great characters left\, and I found myself laughing how stupid the scenes were (laser battering ram). They must have taken 20 lines from the first three films. I will never watch that movie again. Terrible the The Star Wars Saga has become.
